DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Zoo Stamp Kit - Zebra, Panda, Giraffe (3 colors)
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo Zoo Stamp Kits are a perfect way to make your next animal themed party fun and exciting. The Kit includes 3 face paint stamps (zebra, panda and giraffe) and 3 of Snazaroo's 2 ml face paints (black, white and orange).
Snazaroo's specially designed EVA stamps are perfect for use on children. The stamps are approximately one and a half inches at the widest point and one inch thick. Easy to use even for beginner users.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: This Stamp Kit will paint about 750 cheek art designs.
Includes 3 face paint stamps (zebra, panda and giraffe) and 3 of Snazaroo's 2 ml face paints (black, white and orange).
One of the most popular face paints in the world
